      • handleResetPassword

        public HandleResetPassword handleResetPassword(HandleResetPasswordRequest request)
        Create a handle reset password action. This method points to SCV only. A new method, probably with a different name and/or signature, will be implemented once this operation is ready in cloud server
        Parameters:
        request - Object containing request data HandleResetPasswordRequest .
        Returns:
        Action to be executed asynchronously or synchronously

      • resetPassword

        public ResetPassword resetPassword(ResetPasswordRequest request)
        This method works with SCV only. Reset the password of the account identified by the corresponding 'reset password token' given in the requestparameters. This token mentioned above can be found in the email send as a result of handleResetPassword. This method can be used upgrade a light account to a full account.
        Parameters:
        request - Request data to be sent to the server
        Returns:
        Action to be executed asynchronously or synchronously

      • createUser

        public ConnectAction<CreateUserResponse> createUser(CreateUserRequest request)

      • createAccountSocial

        public CreateSocialAccount createAccountSocial(SocialNetwork socialNetwork,
                                               java.lang.String socialUserId,
                                               CreateAccountSocialRequest createAccountSocialRequest,
                                               Token token)
        This method works with SCV only. Method used to create a user using social network information. You must to be logged to run this method.
        Parameters:
        socialNetwork - The social network where the user has logged in. Only Facebook supported from now.
        socialUserId - The id the user has on the social network
        createAccountSocialRequest - The request for the create user where you can set additional information.
        Returns:
        action to launch.

      • refreshAuthToken

        public RefreshToken refreshAuthToken()
        Asynchronously refreshes the auth token of the user account. Refresh token is needed for this action. If it's missing then null is returned.
        Returns:
        Action that will launch a refresh token call

      • removeLoadProxy

        public void removeLoadProxy()
        The load proxy will be used to avoid the server down with a high number of calls. If you have set it using Connect.Builder.setLoadProxy(String, String, String, String) or Connect.Builder.setLoadProxy(String, String, String, String) you can remove using this method. This method will remove the load proxy from the SCV service and the PF service. Note that this method will be only available if SCV is selected as service, otherwise an exception will be thrown.

      • getSession

        public SessionData getSession()
        Returns the session data for the current active user
